item.title: Halp me!
item.dc:creator: @sikeo sikeo
item.description:
@sikeo wrote:

[code]public boolean isInWilderness(int coordX, int coordY, int

Type) {
if (Type == 1) {
if ((coordY >= 3520) && (coordY <= 3967) &&

(coordX <= 3392) && (coordX >= 2942)) {
return true;
}
} else if (Type == 2) {
if ((coordY >= 3512) && (coordY <= 3967) &&

(coordX <= 3392) && (coordX >= 2942)) {
return true;
}
} else if (Type == 3) {
if ((coordY >= 3871) && (coordY <= 3868) &&

(coordX <= 2507) && (coordX >= 2498)) {
return true;
}
return false;
}
}
[/code]
When I compile it gives me an error saying “Missing Return Statement” Then when I put the old one back it goes away

Old one-

[code]public boolean isInWilderness(int coordX, int coordY, int Type) {
if (Type == 1) {
if ((coordY >= 3520) && (coordY <= 3967) &&

(coordX <= 3392) && (coordX >= 2942)) {
return true;
}
} else if (Type == 2) {
if ((coordY >= 3512) && (coordY <= 3967) &&

(coordX <= 3392) && (coordX >= 2942)) {
return true;
}
}
return false;
}[/code]

Someone help???
